evilWithin:GremlinMatchGame.NAME: Match and Keep!
DESCRIPTIONS: " ... #bTwelve cards! Match them to keep them! #bFive tries... no do-overs. NL Are you ready? Let's start!"
You complete the gremlin's game and look up. NL He disappeared?
A gremlin is madly shuffling cards on a table. This monster seems to be a harmless one. As you approach, he nervously breaks his composure for a moment, but finds the courage to address you.
Unwilling to partake in this trivial game, you glare at the Gremlin with a threatening stance. NL He runs away!

evilWithin:WomanInBlue.NAME: The Woman in Blue
DESCRIPTIONS: Tucked in the darkness, you spot a small shop. Within, you see a pale woman in sharp clothes managing an inventory of potions, stacked along a wall. She is startled by your threatening appearance. NL "Leave me and my wares alone, cretin!" she screams.
You exit the shop cautiously, not wanting to spur the woman into a fight.

#r@WHAM@ NL Her gloved fist collides with your face, nearly knocking you off your feet. NL "Get out before I litter the floor with your guts." You take her word and exit with your guts still safely in your body.
